Video.Name: DISMTools - 2 Years
Video.Description: Let's celebrate the 2 years of this project and explore its history together. Please enable video subtitles for the original lyrics

Video.Name: Introducing DISMTools 0.6.1
Video.Description: This new release comes with many features and enhancements that make managing Windows images an easier task. To learn about these new features in more depth, check out the Help documentation.

Video.Name: Getting started with DISMTools
Video.Description: If you are new to DISMTools or image servicing, this tutorial can help you get started.

Video.Name: Using the image information dialogs
Video.Description: The image information dialogs let you get and save information about specific elements of the image you're working on. Learn how to make the most of them in this tutorial.
